Our Atmosphere At Brix33, we believe that the dining experience is about more than just the food. That's why we've created a warm and welcoming atmosphere that's perfect for enjoying a meal with friends or family. Asked on the local ‚ÄúFB Page‚Äù and was directed to your establishment. We LOVED it! The Charcuterie Board was very unique and tasty. The Steak was so tender I barely needed my knife. My Daughter‚Äôs (6 yrs old) favorite part was your Chocolate Cake, she highly recommends it. We will definitely be back. Business response: Awesome! Thank you so much for coming in with your family.
